|- wi(wcel(c0, cplig), wcel(cop(cuni(c0), cres(cid, c0)), cuhgr))
-| wi(wa(wcel(cuni(c0), universe), wcel(cres(cid, c0), universe)), wb(wcel(cop(cuni(c0), cres(cid, c0)), cuhgr), wf(cres(cid, c0), cdm(cres(cid, c0)), cdif(cpw(cuni(c0)), csn(emptycls)))))

stmt.origin: isuhgrop(cuni(c0), universe, cres(cid, c0), universe)

body.origin: |- wi(wa(wcel(cuni(c0), universe), wcel(cres(cid, c0), universe)), wb(wcel(cop(cuni(c0), cres(cid, c0)), cuhgr), wf(cres(cid, c0), cdm(cres(cid, c0)), cdif(cpw(cuni(c0)), csn(emptycls)))))

cumulated.origin: |- wi(wcel(c0, cplig), wcel(cop(cuni(c0), cres(cid, c0)), cuhgr))

comment: Any planar incidence geometry ` G ` can be regarded as a hypergraph with its points as vertices and its lines as edges. See ~ incistruhgr for a generalization of this case for arbitrary incidence structures (planar incidence geometries are such incidence structures). (Proposed by Gerard Lang, 24-Nov-2021.) (Contributed by AV, 28-Nov-2021.)
